mapper.insert: INSERT INTO products (seller_id, product_name, product_desc, image_url, price, product_status, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{sellerId}, #{productName}, #{productDesc}, #{imageUrl}, #{price}, #{productStatus}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM products ORDER BY created_at DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE products SET product_name = #{productName}, product_desc = #{productDesc}, image_url = #{imageUrl}, price = #{price}, product_status = #{productStatus}, updated_at = #{updatedAt} WHERE product_id = #{productId}
